hero.headline: Launch Your Own AI Chatbot Product in a Week
hero.subheadline: Sell branded AI chatbots to your clients for 200–400€/month each—without building any AI in-house.
hero.supporting: Your domain, your logo, your pricing. We power the tech in the background.

values.title: Why Agencies Choose VYBR!S
values.revenue_desc: Turn AI chatbots into 200–400€/month retainers per client. You keep the margin—we handle the platform.
values.whitelabel_desc: Your domain, branding, and client logins—100% agency-branded. Clients never see our name.
values.launch_desc: Spin up a client bot from their website or FAQs in hours. Deploy via widget or embed.
values.scale_desc: Clone setups, adapt content, and roll out bots to 5–10+ clients. All managed from one dashboard.

how_it_works.title: How It Works for Agencies
how_it_works.step1_desc: We set up VYBR!S on your domain with your logo and colors. You get one dashboard to manage all client bots.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Choose a client, sync their website, FAQs, or docs, and configure their AI assistant with our templates.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Offer the chatbot as a 200–400€/month add-on. You own the client relationship and pricing—the platform provides the engine.
how_it_works.step4_desc: Clone setups, adapt content, and roll out bots to 5–10+ clients. All managed from one place.

use_cases.title: Real-World Applications
use_cases.support_tooltip: Automate 24/7 customer support with AI-powered responses that instantly resolve common queries and escalate complex issues to human agents.
use_cases.leads_tooltip: Engage website visitors, collect contact information, and qualify leads based on predefined criteria to optimize your sales funnel.
use_cases.faq_tooltip: Provide instant access to your knowledge base, allowing customers to find answers quickly without browsing through documentation.
use_cases.products_tooltip: Guide customers through your product catalog with personalized recommendations based on their needs and preferences.
use_cases.appointments_tooltip: Enable customers to book appointments directly through the chatbot, with automatic calendar integration and reminders.

technology.title: Built on Enterprise Technology
technology.desc: Robust architecture powered by FastAPI, React, Qdrant vector database, and Perplexity AI LLM
technology.learn_more: Learn More About Our Tech Stack

trust.title: Now Accepting Limited Early Agency Partners for 2025
trust.early_partner: Early partners get founder pricing and direct access to the product roadmap. Limited spots available.

services_page.hero_subtitle: VYBR!S is a white-label AI chatbot platform designed for agencies to resell—not a direct-to-SMB tool. You own the client relationship, branding, and pricing.
services_page.benefit1_desc: Package chatbots as ongoing services and increase MRR per client—without extra dev staff.
services_page.benefit2_desc: A platform clients log into regularly is harder to cancel than a one-off project.
services_page.benefit3_desc: We handle models, vector DB, uptime, and updates. Agencies focus on selling and strategy, not infrastructure.
services_page.economics_intro: See how agencies profit from the VYBR!S partnership:
services_page.econ_takeaway: You keep ~70% margin; we keep the lights on.
services_page.partner_services_title: What We Provide to Agency Partners
services_page.partner_services_intro: These are services for agency partners, not end-clients directly.
services_page.onboarding_desc: We configure VYBR!S on your domain with your logo, colors, and custom email templates. Full white-label setup included.
services_page.implementation_desc: We help you launch your first client bot—from content sync to deployment. Get hands-on guidance to ensure a successful first project.
services_page.templates_desc: Access pre-built conversational flows and best practices for common verticals—rental, local services, professional services, and more.
services_page.optimization_desc: Leverage conversation data to improve bot performance over time. We provide insights and recommendations based on real usage patterns.
services_page.cta_text: Apply as an agency partner and start reselling AI chatbots to your clients.

tech_page.hero_subtitle: Modern, scalable stack designed for multi-tenant, white-label deployments. Secure, fast, and maintained for you.
tech_page.rag_desc: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) ensures factual, context-aware responses based solely on your trained content. No hallucinations, just accurate information.
tech_page.scraping_desc: Playwright-powered rendering handles modern JavaScript sites with automatic sitemap discovery and intelligent content extraction.
tech_page.dashboard_desc: Comprehensive management interface with real-time training monitoring and chatbot testing capabilities.
tech_page.widget_desc: Lightweight, customizable JavaScript widget that integrates seamlessly with any website.
tech_page.security_subtitle: Enterprise-grade security built into every layer of our platform
tech_page.auth_desc: Session-based authentication with Redis-backed session management
tech_page.isolation_desc: Complete tenant separation in multi-tenant architecture
tech_page.encryption_desc: Data encryption in transit and at rest
tech_page.cta_text: See how agencies use our platform to deliver AI chatbot solutions to their clients.

pricing_page.hero_subtitle: One plan designed for agencies reselling white-label AI chatbots
pricing_page.plan_note: Founder pricing for the first 5–10 agencies. Standard pricing is 799€/mo.
pricing_page.addons_subtitle: Scale your chatbot business as you grow
pricing_page.roi_text: Most partners charge 200–400€/month per bot, plus a setup fee of 500–1,000€. With just 10 clients at 250€/month, you generate 2,500€/month from chatbots while paying 499€/month to us.
pricing_page.roi_takeaway: Net profit: 2,001€/month from 10 clients—before any setup fees.
pricing_page.faq1_a: VYBR!S is exclusively for agencies—web agencies, marketing agencies, and consultancies who want to resell AI chatbots to their clients under their own brand.
pricing_page.faq2_a: We can have your white-label platform ready within a week. First client bot can be deployed within hours after that.
pricing_page.faq3_q: What if I need more than 10 client bots?
pricing_page.faq3_a: Simply add extra bots at 99€/month each. No limits on scaling. Please contact us if you need more than 20.
pricing_page.faq4_q: Can I set my own pricing?
pricing_page.faq4_a: Absolutely. You own the client relationship and set your own prices. Most partners charge 200–400€/month per bot.
pricing_page.faq5_q: What if I only want one bot?
pricing_page.faq5_a: Please reach out to us directly for that as well.

contact_page.why2: Direct access to the product roadmap

contact_page.why4: First client bot deployed within hours

about.hero_subtitle: We're empowering agencies to offer AI chatbot solutions through our white-label platform
about.story_p1: ultimAItech emerged from a clear vision: to bridge the gap between cutting-edge AI technology and practical business applications. As specialists in AI and machine learning, we recognized that agencies needed a way to offer AI chatbots without building the infrastructure themselves.
about.story_p2: Our VYBR!S platform is built specifically for agencies to resell. It's a white-label solution that lets you launch AI chatbot products under your own brand—without touching any AI infrastructure.
about.mission_text: Empowering agencies to build new revenue streams through white-label AI chatbot technology that's easy to deploy, reliable, and fully brandable.
about.expertise_text: We built VYBR!S specifically for agencies, not end-users. Every feature is designed to help you resell and manage client chatbots.
about.proprietary_text: Your domain, your branding, your pricing. Clients never see our name.
about.e2e_text: We handle models, infrastructure, updates, and uptime. You focus on selling and client relationships.
about.reliability_text: Built on robust, scalable architecture designed for multi-tenant deployments and enterprise security.
about.success_text: We're not just building a platform—we're building partnerships. Early partners get founder pricing, roadmap access, and direct support to ensure mutual success.
